title: Fundamentals of Substance Designer and Painter
description: Introduction to the development of physically based materials in Substance Designer and Substance Painter. These are then applied to a range of character and machine models within either the Blender or Maya 3D modeling applications.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): CMPM 25 or by permission of the instructor.

class_notes: Enroll in lecture and associated secondary lab
